snippet.title: Here They Lie - Launch Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Here They Lie transports you to a terrifying world from which you cannot escape.  Explore a nightmarish city inhabited by strange, malevolent creatures in this ground-breaking first-person horror game on PlayStation VR.  

http://www.heretheylie.com

Rated Mature: Alcohol Reference, Blood, Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Violence
Struggle to survive as you wrestle with life or death moral choices and try to uncover the mystery of the woman in yellow.

© 2016 Sony Interactive Entertainment America LLC. Here They Lie is a trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment America LLC.
